title.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XXI, No. 18, May 2, 1917. Triumph of the Polish Roman-Catholic Union 100,000 Membership Passed after 44 Years

div.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XXI, No. 18, May 2, 1917. TRIUMPH OF THE POLISH ROMAN-CATHOLIC UNION 100,000 MEMBERSHIP PASSED AFTER 44 YEARS

body.p: A miracle has happened among the Poles in America!
Behold! A Polish Catholic organization has reached and passed the 100,000 membership mark!
This organization is the Polish Roman-Catholic Union.
Today in this Union, whose official organ is the Narod Polski, it is a day of celebration.
